Package it.michelelacorte.swipeablecard

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimationCard
    AnimationCard is an Interface for set-up animation.
    Card
    Interface to create a custom SwipeableCard, need to implements this with default method Created by Michele on 13/02/2016.
    SwipeDismissTouchListenerLeftRight.DismissCallbacks
    The callback interface used by SwipeDismissTouchListenerLeftRight to inform its client about a successful dismissal of the view for which it was created.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityCardCreation
    Created by Michele on 03/03/2016.
    CustomCardAnimation
    Custom Card Animation is a class that allow user to use animation with all card layout
    OptionView
    Option View describes the options that can be set for Swipeable Card, offers a Builder to make configuration options easier for users.
    OptionView.Builder
    Public class Builder for setting up Swipeable Card.
    OptionView.CreditCard
    Credit Card mode
    OptionView.MapsCard
    Maps Card mode
    OptionView.NormalCard
    Normal Card Mode
    OptionViewAdditional
    OptionViewAdditional provide all custom object settable to SwipeableCard.
    OptionViewAdditional.Builder  
    SwipeableCard
    Swipeable Card is a custom view which use CardView to create a custom layout of card.
    SwipeableCardAdapter
    This is an Adapter for RecyclerView that is implemented for al user!
    SwipeableCardAdapter.CardViewHolder  
    SwipeDismissTouchListenerLeftRight
